content: Melanie lives in New York, Donny lives in Washington D.c. and Mar$3 millionm Dollars Largo. Who is visiting Donny when Melanie stays away? We will never know but can only speculate because of the secrecy. It could be any man or women with business with Donny. What kind of business we may never know. I wonder what the National Enquirer would use for the headline. They are ones who broke the Clinton story. What is he hiding?
